name: Agape App
description: AgapeConnect Us by Gods Love   Agape is a social networking app combined with prophetic prophetic art, full of mythology, and the release of heavenly culture, a global platform for quality Christian interaction!   Prophetic Art Servicing   -View and collect Prophetic Paintings (includes scripture & explanations) from artists all over the world -Exchange prophetic arts & blessing among your friends and family    News Feed   -High-quality community social networking platform -Share your thoughts, favorite scriptures, photos, arts and more!   Friends   -Follow friends, family and popular christian leaders! Share their blessings, joy and their way of living.   Soaking Musics   -Listen to Soaking Musics created by Artists around the world.   Bible   -Read and study bible with friends and family. Enjoy musics and arts while reading the words of God.  #Fathers blessing cards #worship #prayer #praise #prosper #church #love #happy group #glory #mercy #jesus #blessing #Holy spirit #prophetic drawing #painting #prophetic words
